name: Hellfo
description:
Hellfo is a hardcore platformer game, where you play as a small demon, who is trapped outside of his home and you are here to help him get back. Game has more than 200 handcrafted levels that will test your reaction time, jumping precision and also your speed to finish levels in the best time possible. You will have to get through 7 chapters, each containing new threats, traps and enemies trying to destroy you!

Hellfo in numbers

  • 200+ playable levels
  • 7 Chapters with 7 Bosses
  • 35+ collectibles
  • 25 unlockable skins
  • 45 achivements

Controls

Hellfo will follow your orders in a very intuitive way, but certain amount of skill is required to truly master his movements.

Collectibles

Collect over 35 items and other relics to unlock not only achievements but also in-game rewards like bonus levels or even skins for you or your wingy friend.

Bosses

In order to beat each chapter, you must face the boss guarding the exit. Every boss offers completely unique experience.
